entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Clinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:10 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 2:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries over northern sections overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
